definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ex 10:13 morning (NH id.; from split, penetrate, as the dawn the darkness, light through cloud-rifts, etc.)—´[[ב]] Ge 1:5 + (alw. abs.); pl. [[בְּקָרִים]] Job 7:18 + 4 t.;—
morning (of point of time, time at which, never during which, Eng. morning = forenoon):—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of end of night (opp. [[לַיְלָה]]) Ex 10:13 (J) Le 6:2 (P) Ju Jdg 19:25, Ru 3:13, Ru 3:13, Is 21:12 cf. 1Sa 19:11 (‖[[מחר]], opp. [[לילה]]); opp. [[לֵילוֹת]] Ps 92:3; also (opp. [[לוּן]]) Ex 23:18, Ex 34:25 (both JE) Le 19:13 (H) De 16:4; opp. [[חלמות]] Am 5:8; cf. further Ge 40:6, Ge 41:8 (both E) Ex 12:22, Ex 34:2, Ex 34:2 (both JE) 1Sa 3:15 +, †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: implying the coming of dawn, and even daylight Ge 29:25 (E) Ge 44:3 (J) 1Ki 3:21 (but Klo here for 2nd [[בַּבּׂקֶר]], rds. [[לְבַקֵּר]] by looking at it v. [[בָּקַר]]) Job 24:17, Job 38:12 (‖[[שַׁחַר]]); ´[[לִפְנוֹת הַבּ]] Ex 14:27 (JE) at the turn of the morning, so Ju Jdg 19:26 (‖[[בַּעֲלוֹת הַשָָּׁחַר]] v:Jdg 19:25; sq. [[עַד־הָאוֹר]], as something later, v:Jdg 19:26); vid. Ru 3:14 (‖[[בטרו֠ם יכיר אישׁ את רעהו]] before men could recognise each other); cf. [[כּוֹכְבֵי בׂקֶר]] Job 38:7 stars of morning; but also c. [[אוֹר]] vb. Ge 44:3 (J) [[הבקר אור]]; c. [[אור]] noun, [[באור הבקר]] Mic 2:1; & esp. [[עד אור הבקר]] Ju Jdg 16:2 (opp. [[לילה]]) so 1Sa 14:36; also 1Sa 25:22, 1Sa 25:34, 1Sa 25:36, 2Sa 17:22, 2Ki 7:9; cf. 1Sa 29:10 (‖[[וְאוֹר לָכֶם]]). †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of coming of sunrise Ju Jdg 9:33, 2Sa 23:4, 2Sa 23:4, 2Ki 3:22 cf. [[וערב]] ´[[מוֹצָּאֵי ב]] Ps 65:9 i.e. places of sunrise and sunset (‖[[קְחוֹת]] i.e. ends of earth).

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: of beginning of day, [[וְעַד־עַתָּה]] ´[[מֵאָו הַבּ]] Ru 2:7 (cf. v:Ru 2:14) vid. 2Sa 24:15 (but del. We Dr); time of prayer, & praise Ps 5:4, Ps 5:4 (v. Hu) Ps 59:17, Ps 88:14, Ps 92:3; ‖[[חהרים]] noon 1Ki 18:26, Je 20:16; of three hours of prayer, [[ערב ובקר וחהרים]] Ps 55:18 (cf. Da 6:10; Da 6:13); cf. also c. [[עֶרֶב]] infr.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: opp. [[עֶרֶב]] Ge 49:27 (poem in J) Ex 16:7, Ex 16:8, Ex 16:12, Ex 16:13, Le 6:13, Nu 9:21 (all P) De 28:67, De 28:67, 2Sa 11:14, 1Ki 17:6, Is 17:14, Zep 3:3, Ez Eze 24:18, Eze 24:18, Eze 33:22, Da 8:26, Ps 30:6, Ps 90:5, Ps 90:6, Ec 11:6, 1Ch 16:40, 2Ch 2:3, 2Ch 13:11, 2Ch 31:3, Ezr 3:3, Es 2:14; opp. [[בֵּין הערבים]] Ex 29:39, Ex 29:41, Nu 28:4, Nu 28:8 (all P); esp. [[מן־הבקר עד־הערב]] = all day Ex 18:13 & (without art.) v:Ex 18:14 (both E); [[מבקר לָעֶרֶב]] Job 4:20 = between morning and evening; also [[מֵעֶרֶב עַד־בּׂקֶר]] = all night, Ex 27:21 (P) Le 24:3 (H) Nu 9:21 & ´[[בָּעֶרֶב עַד־בּ]] Nu 9:15 (both P); note also the formula [[וַיְהִי ערב ויהי בקר]] and evening came and then morning Ge 1:5, Ge 1:8, Ge 1:13, Ge 1:19, Ge 1:23, Ge 1:31 (all P), i.e. the day ended with evening, and the night with morning; peculiar is Da 8:14 of om. of daily sacrif. [[עַד עֶרֶב בּׂקֶר אַלְפַּיִם וּשְׁלשׁ מֵאוֹת]], until 2300 evening-mornings, prob. = 2300 half-days (Ew Hi Meinh Bev Dr:Intr. 464, cf. v:Da 8:26 & 3½ times (years) Da 7:25, Da 12:11, 12:17).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: oft. (above & elsewh.) c. prep. (+ art. exc. Job 7:18); in the morning, [[בַּבּׂקֶר]] Ge 19:27 + 110 t., cf. also ´[[בִּהְיׁת הַבּ]] Ex 19:16; in (or at) the morning, ´[[לַבּ]] Am 4:4 + 7 t.; for (against or by) the morning, ´[[לַבּ]] Ex 34:2 cf. Ps 130:6 (cf. Che crit. n.); nearly = until ([[עַד־]]) Ex 34:25, De 16:4, Zep 3:3; further ´[[בַּבּ]] ´[[בַּבּ]] morning by morning, every morning † Ex 16:21, Ex 30:7, Ex 36:3, Le 6:5 (all P) 2Sa 13:4, 1Ch 23:30, 2Ch 13:11, Is 28:19, Is 50:4, Ez Eze 46:13, Eze 46:14, Eze 46:15, Zep 3:5 also ´[[לַבּ]] ´[[לַבּ]], same sense, † 1Ch 9:27; † pl. [[לַבְּקָרִים]] every m. afresh Ps 73:14, Is 33:2 cf. La 3:23; alm. = continually Ps 101:8 (cf. Je 21:12); v. [[לִבְקָרִים]] † Job 7:18 (‖[[לִרְגׇעִים]] every moment); also without prep. or art. in the morning Ho 7:6 cf. Ps 5:4, Ps 5:4, Ps 55:18,

definitions.title: 2. g.
definitions.body: fig. of bright joy after night of distress (poet.) Job 11:17; cf. Ps 30:6, Ps 46:6 (´[[לִפְנוֹת בּ]]) Ps 49:15, Ps 59:17, Ps 90:14, Ps 143:8.

morrow, next day (cf. Germ. Morgen, morgen) without art. Ex 16:19, Ex 16:20, Le 7:15, Le 22:30 (opp. [[הַיּוֹם הַהוּא]]) Nu 16:5 (‖[[מָחָר]] v:Nu 16:7, v:Nu 16:16) cf. Ex 12:10, Ex 12:10, Nu 9:12; with art. Ex 16:23, Ex 16:24, Ex 29:34; ´[[לַבּ]] Ex 34:25, Nu 22:41, Zep 3:3; ´[[בַּבּ]] 1Sa 9:19 (opp. [[הַיּוֹם]] to-day) cf. 1Sa 20:35; to-morrow morning ´[[הַבּ]] Ju Jdg 6:31 (Stu); ´[[בַּבּ]] Ex 7:15, Jos 7:14, Es 5:14; definitely [[מִמָּֽחֳרָת]] ´[[בַּבּ]] 1Sa 5:4; ´[[מֵהַבּ]] 2Sa 2:27; adverb. use in this sense (without prep. or art.) Ex 16:7, Nu 16:5.
